results.title: The Impact of Metformin Use with Survival Outcomes in Urologic Cancers: A Systematic Review and Meta-Analysis
results.text_hl: For @<m>DISEASE_Kidney_Neoplasms</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D007680 @@@kidney cancer@@@, @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ was beneficial for progression (HR = 0.80; 95% CI: 0.65-0.98; P = 0.14; I2 = 46%).

results.title: A Randomized Study on the Effect of Metformin Combined with Intensive-Exercise Diet Therapy on Glucose and Lipid Metabolism and Islet Function in Patients with Renal Cell Carcinoma and Diabetes
results.text_hl: Accordingly, this study adopted @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ combined with exercise and diet therapy for @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@ with @<m>DISEASE_Kidney_Neoplasms</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D007680 @@@renal cancer@@@ and @DISEASE_Diabetes_Mellitus @DISEASE_MESH:D003920 @@@diabetes@@@ and gained desirable outcomes.

results.title: Increased kidney cancer risk in diabetes mellitus patients: a population-based cohort study in Lithuania.
results.text_hl: The objective of this study was to evaluate the association between T2DM with or without @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ use and the risk of @<m>DISEASE_Kidney_Neoplasms</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D007680 @@@kidney cancer@@@ in a population-based national cohort in Lithuania.

citations.NLM: Undzyte G, Patasius A, Linkeviciute-Ulinskiene D, Zabuliene L, Stukas R, Dulskas A, Smailyte G. Increased kidney cancer risk in diabetes mellitus patients: a population-based cohort study in Lithuania. Aging Male. 2020 Dec;23(5):1241-1245. PMID: 32342709

results.title: Hospitalization for Heart Failure Among Patients With Diabetes Mellitus and Reduced Kidney Function Treated With Metformin Versus Sulfonylureas: A Retrospective Cohort Study
results.text_hl: ...Persistent use of @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ after @<m>DISEASE_Kidney_Neoplasms</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D007680 @@@kidney function decline@@@ is associated with reduced risk of @DISEASE_Heart_Failure @DISEASE_MESH:D006333 @@@heart failure@@@ hospitalizations compared with sulfonylurea drugs.

results.title: Progression of established non-diabetic chronic kidney disease is halted by metformin treatment in rats.
results.text_hl: Chronic @CHEMICAL_Adenine @CHEMICAL_MESH:D000225 @@@adenine@@@ dosing resulted in severe @DISEASE_Renal_Insufficiency_Chronic @DISEASE_MESH:D051436 @@@CKD@@@ in vehicle-treated @SPECIES_10116 @@@rats@@@ as indicated by a marked rise in serum @CHEMICAL_Creatinine @CHEMICAL_MESH:D003404 @@@creatinine@@@ levels, a marked decrease in @CHEMICAL_Creatinine @CHEMICAL_MESH:D003404 @@@creatinine@@@ clearance, and a disturbed mineral metabolism. @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@Metformin@@@, but not @CHEMICAL_Canagliflozin @CHEMICAL_MESH:D000068896 @@@canagliflozin@@@, halted @<m>DISEASE_Kidney_Neoplasms</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D007680 @@@functional kidney decline@@@.

citations.NLM: Corremans R, Neven E, Maudsley S, Leysen H, De Broe ME, D'Haese PC, Vervaet BA, Verhulst A. Progression of established non-diabetic chronic kidney disease is halted by metformin treatment in rats. Kidney Int. 2022 May;101(5):929-944. PMID: 35271933

results.title: A randomized controlled clinical trial study protocol of Liuwei Dihuang pills in the adjuvant treatment of diabetic kidney disease
results.text_hl: Based on TCM theory and clinical experience, the syndrome of @<m>DISEASE_Kidney_Neoplasms</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D007680 @@@kidney yin deficiency@@@ is a common type of @DISEASE_Diabetic_Nephropathies @DISEASE_MESH:D003928 @@@DKD@@@.
